simpledb

Class PlanCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.PlanCache

  • public class PlanCache
extends java.lang.Object
    A PlanCache is a helper class that can be used to store the best way to order a given set of joins

    • Method Detail

      • addPlan

        void addPlan(java.util.Set<LogicalJoinNode> s,
           double cost,
           int card,
           java.util.Vector<LogicalJoinNode> order)
        Add a new cost, cardinality and ordering for a particular join set. Does not verify that the new cost is less than any previously added cost -- simply adds or replaces an existing plan for the specified join set
        Parameters:
        s - the set of joins for which a new ordering (plan) is being added
        cost - the estimated cost of the specified plan
        card - the estimatied cardinality of the specified plan
        order - the ordering of the joins in the plan

      • getOrder

        java.util.Vector<LogicalJoinNode> getOrder(java.util.Set<LogicalJoinNode> s)
        Find the best join order in the cache for the specified plan
        Parameters:
        s - the set of joins to look up the best order for
        Returns:
        the best order for s in the cache

      • getCost

        double getCost(java.util.Set<LogicalJoinNode> s)
        Find the cost of the best join order in the cache for the specified plan
        Parameters:
        s - the set of joins to look up the best cost for
        Returns:
        the cost of the best order for s in the cache

      • getCard

        int getCard(java.util.Set<LogicalJoinNode> s)
        Find the cardinality of the best join order in the cache for the specified plan
        Parameters:
        s - the set of joins to look up the best cardinality for
        Returns:
        the cardinality of the best order for s in the cache
